13867201:
Please wake up why you sleeping?
I've been awake but you heard me breathing.
No I don't know how to tell you.
I just don't want to be lost too.

But on and on and on you told me.
Nothing is wrong, it never will be.
All the time I knew that that's not true.
We used to say that we're forever.
Running around do nothing better.

I have something to say, before I go.
That anything is enough for two.
All I wanted was to share it with you.
Now my heart's on a different path.
And I... can see nobody there.
But I will always remember your smell.
The way you walk and how you laugh as well.
You made it clear what I had to do.
...

(1409613209382)

No one else is here
Just the sound of silence that I do not fear
Counting every star I wonder where you are
Have you forgotten that I'm the one you once adored
I remember when you said:
I like it when you do that thing with your dread
You wanted me to stay
I knew it would be late
and by that time we were standing in your door
I was  scared although I wanted you some more

I realise you're so hard to know
and I wonder were we are
I can hear you calling
And it will never be the same but you remain
You're always in my heart
I can hear you calling
I can hear you calling now
Yes I can hear you calling
I can hear you calling now

It's easiest to fall
But not to lose your pride
They say it's best for all
What more can I say
I miss you every day
And I wonder will it ever be alright?
It feels like everything  is here for you tonight

I.
I need som time
to think about what a should tell you
when you come home to me tonight

You.
You may not see
while your away how much I miss you
although I know you will come some day

Just to see that you've changed in a way
that no one can explain
makes me think of what you told me
on that day when you left

You said you needed a friend I'm a friend
we started out as friends and I hope we'll be together
in the end somehow

Verse 1

Just in case you, may not want to
Would you hide it and tell me you do?
We've been walking, and we've been talking
Spending hours, I don't mind at all
I couldn't help it, I fell in to you
All I wanted, came out of the blue
And now I stand here, don't know what to do?

Chorus 1

But you live your life, you know just where you are

It kinda hit me yesterday
That you'll grow up like me someday
But we're not yet there
It comes a time when you don't know
Only you know better
You make decisions on your own
but we're still here

Whatever they do,
Whatever they say,
Leave it tonight and go your own way
And then you'll sing, you'll do your thing.
Believe me when I say so,
I want you to know how things can feel
Keep you away from what is out there,
I wanna prepare you on for what's real
You'll get by and get it your way,
